dmca.title: libelous comments on website re company
dmca.body:
Dear [Recipient]

Thank you for your email. You are of course welcome to your opinions regarding what you perceive as 
my priorities, despite the fact that they are incorrect. Your perception of my interest in money is 
also incorrect, but please do feel free to hold to your opinion. You should be aware that I did not 
take your comments lightly, and spent some considerable time talking to my guides in Moshi, passing 
on your words verbatim and listening to their responses. That is a part of my job.

I would ask that you remove my company name from your mass email on your website. What you say 
verbally is entirely at your discretion of course but what you have written constitutes libel, 
especially when you directly comment that I 'accused' you of bringing situations upon yourself. I 
simply related to you the response of my guides, whom I trust implicitly after a very long time 
working with them. 

Your response to this would be appreciated. 

[Sender]
